casebody.data:
The GOODYEAR TIRE & RUBBER COMPANY, petitioner,
v.
Leroy HAEGER, et al. No. 15-1406. Supreme Court of the United States Sept. 29, 2016.

Petition for writ of certiorari to the United States Court of Appeals for the Ninth Circuit granted limited to Question 1 presented by each petition. The case is consolidated and a total of one hour is allotted for oral argument.
